meanings.definition: To surpass in wishing or desire.
meanings.sent1: She always outwishes her friends when it comes to birthday presents.
meanings.sent2: I outwish my sister for a new toy.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outwished her brother for the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: His longing for adventure outwishes all others.
meanings.sent5: Her dreams outwish reality every night.

meanings.definition: To have a greater wish or desire than someone else.
meanings.sent1: My brother always outwishes me when it comes to desserts.
meanings.sent2: She outwishes her classmates for a longer recess.
meanings.sent3: The puppy outwishes the kitten for attention.
meanings.sent4: His hunger outwishes mine for a snack.
meanings.sent5: Their excitement outwishes all others at the party.
